Html:
Please update source code for 1.7 release.

Thanks,
-Szymon

Hi,
     Our team is working towards getting source code for 1.7.0 Toolkit samples.
Meantime Please feel free to download Kinect for windows toolkit at
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/kinectforwindows/develop/developer-downloads.aspx

PS: I think you meant 1.7.0 Toolkit Samples Source code.

Sorry for the delay,
Ashok.

Yes, I meant the source code of samples :-)
Thanks for the update and great work on getting this out !
